gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 116, Pacers 103
gameRecap.excerpt: Desmond Bane led Memphis with 31 points, seven assists, and six rebounds as the Grizzlies defeated the Pacers, 116-103. Jaren Jackson Jr. (21 points, seven rebounds) and Ja Morant (20 points, five rebounds, eight assists) led Memphis as Obi Toppin (22 points) and Tyrese Haliburton (17 points, 14 assists) led Indiana. The Grizzlies improve to 8-19 as the Pacers move to 14-13.
